description: Musk mallow (Abelmoschus moschatus) is an amazing plant. It is a tall, herbaceous annual with attractive flowers, growing up to two metres in height and bearing large, hibiscus-like blooms in shades of pink and purple. It has a distinctive, musky scent, and its flowers are highly attractive to bees and butterflies. It is an excellent choice for Borders, Containers and Cottage Gardens, with a wonderfully long flowering period. It is also an ideal cut flower and is an important source of food in some parts of the world. Overall, its fast-growing, easy-to-maintain habit and its beautiful flowers make musk mallow an ideal choice for any garden.
